subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – pictographic representation of a fish.

subSections.text:
{{attention|ja|Compounds need expanding; idioms still needed.}}
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|魚類}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
[[File:Macropodus_opercularis_-_front_(aka).jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|魚}} (''uo'', ''io'', ''o'', ''sakana''): fish]]
{{ja-kanjitab|うお|yomi=k}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=うお}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The pronunciation shifted from {{IPAchar|/uwo/}} to {{IPAchar|/uo/}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|活%魚|いけ%うお}}: live fish and shellfish (kept in a tank in a restaurant)
* {{ja-r|魚%河岸|うお%がし}}: riverside fish market
* {{ja-r|魚%座|うお%ざ}}: [[Pisces]] (constellation), the Fish, the Fishes;
* {{ja-r|魚%印|うお%じるし}}: a [[mark]] made on a fish, such as a [[cut]] on a [[fin]], to identify one's own catch when fishing together with others
* {{ja-r|魚%釣り|うお%つり}}: [[fishing]]
* {{ja-r|魚%屋|うお%や}}: a [[fishmonger]]
* {{ja-r|魚 市%場|うお いち%ば}}: a [[fish]] [[market]]
* {{ja-r|魚%河岸|うお%がし}}: a [[riverside]] [[fish]] [[market]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|雷%魚|かみなり%うお}}: [[sailfin sandfish]]
* {{ja-r|川%魚|かわ%うお}}: river fish; [[freshwater]] fish
* {{ja-r|山%椒%魚|さん%しょう%うお}}: a [[salamander]]
* {{ja-r|白%魚|しら%うお}}: [[icefish]]
* {{ja-r|刺%魚|とげ%うお}}: a [[stickleback]] fish
* {{ja-r|飛び魚|とびうお}}: [[flying fish]]
* {{ja-r|氷%魚|ひ%うお}}: a [[transparent]] [[sweetfish]] [[fingerling]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Etymology 3
Derived terms
Etymology 4
Noun
Etymology 5
Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: This is now the most common general word for {{m|en|fish}} in modern standard Japanese. The {{m|en|side dish}} sense is more commonly spelled {{ja-l|肴}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|小%魚|こ%ざかな}}: small fish
* {{ja-r|下%魚|げ%ざかな}}: inferior fish, cheap fish
* {{ja-r|魚%釣り|さかな%つり}}: [[fishing]]
* {{ja-r|魚%屋|さかな%や}}: a [[fishmonger]]; a fish [[store]] or [[shop]]
* {{ja-r|魚%河岸|さかな%がし}}: a [[riverside]] [[fish]] [[market]]
* {{ja-r|生%魚|なま%ざかな}}: raw fish
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 6
Derived terms
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{IPAchar|/uwo/}} → {{IPAchar|/iwo/}} → {{IPAchar|/io/}} → {{IPAchar|/iu/}}

Cognate with {{etyl|ojp|-}} {{m|ja|魚|tr=uwo}}. Compare modern dialectal mainland Japanese {{m|ja|魚|tr=io}}, first appearing in print and becoming common from the [[w:Heian period|Heian period]], but likely extant earlier.
